meanings.definition: Asking for information or specifying something
meanings.sent1: Tell me what you want for dinner.
meanings.sent2: I wonder what time the movie starts.
meanings.sent3: What do you think the clouds are made of?
meanings.sent4: Her eyes searched the room, trying to see what was hidden.
meanings.sent5: The detective asked the witness what he saw that night.

meanings.sent1: I will eat what is on my plate.
meanings.sent2: She can choose what she wants from the store.
meanings.sent3: What you wear to the party doesn't matter.
meanings.sent4: The box contained what she needed to fix the broken toy.
meanings.sent5: He picked up what he thought was a rock, but it turned out to be a fossil.

meanings.sent1: The book is what I need to finish my project.
meanings.sent2: She showed me what she bought at the store.
meanings.sent3: What you said made her smile.
meanings.sent4: His collection of stamps is what he is most proud of.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map led them to what they had been searching for all along.
